name: Pumpkin-Coffee Milkshake
description: This afternoon pick-me up is a little less sweet than your regular milkshake, adding coffee into the mix—in the form of strong brewed coffee as well as coffee ice cream.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups coffee ice cream (about 6 medium scoops)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir brown sugar into coffee to dissolve. Let cool.

Add coffee mixture, milk, pumpkin, cinnamon, cloves, and ginger to the jar of a blender. Add ice cream and pulse until smooth. Divide between serving glasses and garnish with a few coffee beans if desired.
